|brand = Check Point |model = V-80 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev: 1.03 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/03/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Check_Point_V-80 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = network security platform |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 00EB557-00-103-RS |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F7040; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kioxia;THGBMNG5D1LBAIL; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD512M8D3-HR; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6352; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.03;release-19.06.3; |stockos = Linux;4.14.76;Check Point RD-6281-A;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CN3
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, power switch |addchip = USB-to-UART Bridge Controller;Silicon Labs;CP2102N;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, 10A, 18V Synchronous Step-Down Controller;MPS;MPQ8636;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;2;,,, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter;ON Semi;NCP3235;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;1;,,, 2-Wire 4K Bit Serial EEPROM;Giantec Semi;GT24C04A;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAGBAHNW2554 |asin = B08QMJYRGC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "00EB557-00-103-RS", "Check Point V-80", and "Rev:1.03" are silk-screened on the board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F7040 @1.4GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) *Storage: 4GB eMMC Flash *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 6x GbE (WAN/LAN) ports *PCI: 1x mini-PCIe port *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3.3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/products/1500-security-gateway-datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Check Point V-80 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point V-80 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Check Point V-80 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
